item.title: Making a simple adaptive Flexdashboard
item.description: This short post documents how some time ago I made a flexdashboard to easily monitor blood examination results over time and make them more comparable for the patient; for example as part of a patient empowerment initiative (1Reichardt & Gastmeier, 2013). While the dashboard itself is nothing special I think it might be interesting to other data scientists how I realized the tabset feature, which automatically adjusts the number of tab-panels and plots to the number of variables in the data.
